TI

Class Servo

  • java.lang.Object
    • TI.Servo

  • public class Servo
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to control servo motors, and keep them under control in the background

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Servo(int pin)
      Creates a servo on a specific pin, and starts it right away

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void start()
      Starts (or resumes) the servo
      void stop()
      Stops the servo
      void update(int pulseWidth)
      Changes the servo's speed

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Servo

        public Servo(int pin)
        Creates a servo on a specific pin, and starts it right away
        Parameters:
        pin - The BoeBot Pin number

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the servo

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts (or resumes) the servo

      • update

        public void update(int pulseWidth)
        Changes the servo's speed
        Parameters:
        pulseWidth - the width of the pulse, in milliseconds
